verbose_text: Indirect evidence for a potential beneficial effect on endothelial function comes from a study demonstrating that the DPP-4 inhibitor sitagliptin increases endothelial progenitor cells in type 2 diabetes by inhibiting degradation of the chemokine stromal derived factor 1-alpha.
evidence: sitagliptin increases endothelial progenitor cells in type 2 diabetes by inhibiting degradation of the chemokine
